benchmark_details.name: TutorQA (Tutor Question Answering)
benchmark_details.overview: TutorQA is a new expert-verified benchmark for QA, comprising six tasks and a total of 1,200 QA pairs specifically designed for KG-based question answering in the NLP educational scenario.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the practical usefulness of the Graphusion-constructed KG from an educational perspective.

data.source: Collected QA pairs validated by human experts, originating from various educational contexts.

methodology.calculation: Human evaluation based on expert ratings for entity and relation quality, using 3-point scales for different tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in knowledge graph-based question answering.
methodology.baseline_results: Compared against traditional supervised baselines and other existing benchmarks.
methodology.validation: Expert evaluation for the quality of responses generated.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Demographic factors considered based on educational backgrounds of question scenarios.
